items.title: The East Wing is gone, and Trump turns to damage control
items.description: Demolition crews appeared to finish taking down the bulk of the White House wing Thursday, while President Donald Trump defended the project.

items.title: To counter Trump, Virginia Democrats plan to redraw congressional map
items.description: Virginia Democrats will move to call in a special session as soon as Thursday to consider redrawing its congressional district map lines.
